index.html
ㄴstyles.scss
ㄴreset.scss

_titles.scss

%miniTitle {
	font-family: "Montserrat";
	font-weight: 500;
	font-size: 10px;
	text-transform: uppercase;
	letter-spacing: 2px;
}

_variables.scss

$bg: #f3ede8;
$sideSpace: 140px;

styles.scss

@import "https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Montserrat:400, 500&display=swap";
@import "https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Caladea:400&display=swap";
@import "_variables";
@import "_titles";

* {
	box-sizing: border-box;
}

a {
	text-decoration: none;
	color: inherit;
	@extend %miniTitle;
}

body {
	font-family: "Caladea";
	padding-top: 70px;
}

//STUDY
//body > * - body 하위 첫번째 depth 영역들만 선택
//body > *:not(.footer) - .footer영역제외 모든 body 하위 첫번째 depth 영역
body > *:not(.footer) {
	padding: 0px 140px;
}

header {
	//STUDY
	z-index: 1; //.gallery img에 hover시에 header영역이 가려지는 효과로 세팅
	//STUDY
	//header에 고정 하는 역할
	position: fixed;
	top: 0;
	left: 0;
	//-end
	width: 100%;
	padding: 0px 140px;
	background-color: white;
	height: 70px;
	display: flex;
	align-items: center;
	nav {
		width: 100%;
		display: flex;
		justify-content: space-between;
		align-items: center;
		ul {
			display: flex;
			// justify-content: right;
			text-transform: uppercase;
			font-size: 10px;
			@extend %miniTitle;
			&:first-child {
				// border: 1px red solid;
				li {
					margin-right: 60px;
				}
				// li :nth-child(1) {
				// 	margin: 0px;
				// }
			}
		}
	}
}

.hero {
	height: 100vh;
	background-image: url(https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1588605692549-e79acb1fc29b?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1834&q=80);

	//STUDY
	background-size: cover;
	display: flex;
	flex-direction: column;
	align-items: center;
	justify-content: center;
	color: white;
	margin: 0px $sideSpace 60px;
	h4 {
		@extend %miniTitle;
		margin-bottom: 30px;
	}
	h3 {
		font-size: 48px;
		width: 35%;
		text-align: cneter;
		margin-bottom: 50px;
	}
	a {
		width: 10%;
		background-color: white;
		padding: 20px 0px;
		text-align: center;
		text-decoration: none;
		color: black;
		@extend %miniTitle;
		font-size: 10px;
		//STUDY
		//transition: 효과를 주고 싶은 el에 준다.
		//&:hover 이벤트가 일어 났을때 설정한 대로 0.3s linear 방식으로 동작한다.
		transition: color 0.3s linear, background 0.3s linear;
		&:hover {
			background-color: black;
			color: white;
		}
	}
}

.under-hero {
	//STUDY
	//vh(vertical height): css unit으로 css7가지 단위중 하나로 브라우저 크기에 따라서 높이가 달라진다.
	height: 80vh;
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	margin-bottom: 80px;
	.under-hero__content {
		height: 100%;
		display: flex;
		flex-direction: column;
		justify-content: center;
		align-items: center;
		background-color: $bg;
		.wrapper {
			display: flex;
			flex-direction: column;
			align-items: center;
			justify-content: center;
			h4 {
				@extend %miniTitle;
				margin-bottom: 30px;
			}
			h3 {
				font-size: 36px;
				text-align: center;
				margin-bottom: 50px;
			}
			a {
				border: 1px solid black;
				padding: 20px;
			}
		}
		img,
		div {
			width: 50%;
		}
	}
}

.blog {
	width: 100%;
	//display: grid설정
	display: grid;
	grid-template-columns: 1fr;
	grid-template-rows: repeat(3, 60vh);
	//-end
	margin-bottom: 80px;
	.blog__post {
		background-color: $bg;
		display: grid;
		grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
		&:nth-child(even) {
			img {
				// STUDY
				// html은 그대로지만 order property로 el구조를 변경할 수 있다.
				// https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/order
				order: 1;
			}
		}
		img {
			width: 100%;
			height: 100%;
		}
		.post__content {
			display: flex;
			flex-direction: column;
			justify-content: center;
			align-items: center;
			.post__date {
				@extend %miniTitle;
				margin-bottom: 70px;
			}
			h4 {
				font-size: 32px;
				margin-bottom: 40px;
			}
			a {
				&:hover {
					opacity: 0.5;
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

.gallery {
	//STUDY
	//display: grid 설정
	//column은 4개 블럭, 같은 크기로
	//row는 2개 블럭 410px 높이로 지정
	display: grid;
	grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
	grid-template-rows: repeat(2, 410px);
	.gallery__poster {
		height: 100%;
		cursor: pointer;
		img {
			max-width: 100%;
			height: 100%;
			transition: opacity 0.3s linear;
			&:hover {
				opacity: 0.5;
			}
		}
	}
}

.footer {
	margin-top: 100px;
	background-color: $bg;
	display: grid;
	grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
	padding: 65px 0px;
	.footer__column {
		display: flex;
		flex-direction: column;
		align-items: center;
		@extend %miniTitle;
		.column__title {
			margin-bottom: 50px;
			opacity: 0.5;
		}
		ul {
			text-align: center;
			li {
				margin-bottom: 15px;
			}
		}
		&:nth-child(2) {
			border-right: 1px solid black;
			border-left: 1px solid black;
		}
	}
}

index.html

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <title>clone1. Paint Box Coding</title>
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="dist/css/reset.css" />
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="dist/css/styles.css" />
</head>

<body>

  <header>
    <nav>
      <ul>
        <li>Nail Studios</li>
        <li>Shop Polish</li>
      </ul>
      <ul>
        <li>Journal</li>
      </ul>
    </nav>
  </header>

  <section class="hero">
    <h4>The Uptown Collection</h4>
    <h3>
      Meet our newest nails, designed in collaboration with our friends on the
      Upper East Side.
    </h3>
    <a href="#">Read More</a>
  </section>

  <section class="under-hero">
    <img src="./img/clone2/nails2.png" />
    <div class="under-hero__content">
      <div class="wrapper">
        <h4>The Studio</h4>
        <h3>
          Book a manicure at our Soho flagship studio or our new Uptown
          studio, 20 East 69th Street at Madison Avenue.
        </h3>
        <a href="#">Book a Manicure</a>
      </div>
    </div>
  </section>

  <section class="blog">
    <article class="blog__post">
      <img src="./img/clone2/nails3.png" />
      <div class="post__content">
        <span class="post__date">Feb 25, 2020</span>
        <h4>New and Now: The Uptown Collection</h4>
        <a href="#">Read Story</a>
      </div>
    </article>
    <article class="blog__post">
      <img src="./img/clone2/nails3.png" />
      <div class="post__content">
        <span class="post__date">Feb 25, 2020</span>
        <h4>New and Now: The Uptown Collection</h4>
        <a href="#">Read Story</a>
      </div>
    </article>
    <article class="blog__post">
      <img src="./img/clone2/nails3.png" />
      <div class="post__content">
        <span class="post__date">Feb 25, 2020</span>
        <h4>New and Now: The Uptown Collection</h4>
        <a href="#">Read Story</a>
      </div>
    </article>
  </section>

  <section class="gallery">
    <div class="gallery__poster">
      <img src="./img/clone2/nails4.png" />
    </div>
    <div class="gallery__poster">
      <img src="./img/clone2/nails4.png" />
    </div>
    <div class="gallery__poster">
      <img src="./img/clone2/nails4.png" />
    </div>
    <div class="gallery__poster">
      <img src="./img/clone2/nails4.png" />
    </div>
    <div class="gallery__poster">
      <img src="./img/clone2/nails4.png" />
    </div>
    <div class="gallery__poster">
      <img src="./img/clone2/nails4.png" />
    </div>
    <div class="gallery__poster">
      <img src="./img/clone2/nails4.png" />
    </div>
    <div class="gallery__poster">
      <img src="./img/clone2/nails4.png" />
    </div>
  </section>

  <footer class="footer">
    <div class="footer__column">
      <span class="column__title">Support</span>
      <ul>
        <li>F.A.Q.</li>
        <li>Privacy Policu</li>
        <li>Terms and Conditions</li>
        <li>Accessibility</li>
      </ul>
    </div>
    <div class="footer__column">
      <span class="column__title">Follow Us</span>
      <ul>
        <li>Instagram</li>
        <li>Twitter</li>
      </ul>
    </div>
    <div class="footer__column">

</body>

</html>

STUDY POINT

STUDY1. flex

  • flex s3school 가이드

    • https://www.w3schools.com/css/css3_flexbox.asp

  • flex css trick 가이드

    • https://css-tricks.com/snippets/css/a-guide-to-flexbox/

  • flex box로 만들수 있는 10가지 레이아웃

    • https://d2.naver.com/helloworld/8540176

  • 아래 예제에서는 아래와 같은 형식으로 사용

    display: flex;
flex-direction: column;           //기본값 row/ column 가로 세로 전환
justify-content: space-between/ center;
align-items: center;

STUDY2. grid

  • grid w3school 가이드

    • https://www.w3schools.com/css/css_grid_item.asp

  • grid css trick 가이드

    • https://css-tricks.com/snippets/css/complete-guide-grid/

  • grid-template-columns 속성 테스트

    • https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/grid-template-columns

STUDY3. CSS Unit (CSS 7가지 단위)

  • rem, vh, vw, vmin, vmax, ex, ch https://webclub.tistory.com/356

STUDY4. background-size

  • 참고 자료

    • https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/background-size

STUDY5. transition

  • w3school: 간단설명

    • https://www.w3schools.com/css/css3_transitions.asp

  • css trick: 상세설명

    • https://css-tricks.com/almanac/properties/t/transition/

  • mozilla: 테스트코드

    • https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/CSS_Transitions
